data.name: WWE 2K22 - SuperCharger
data.detailed_description:
HIT WITH EVERY LEGEND FROM ULTIMATE WARRIOR TO STONE COLD 

With the WWE 2K22 SuperCharger, the biggest Legends in the WWE universe are in your hands. Unlock ALL WWE Legends available at launch, including The Ultimate Warrior and “Stone Cold” Steve Austin. Access SummerSlam ’88 and WCW Nitro arenas so real you’ll be saying “Ohhh yeahh!” like the Macho Man Randy Savage.

 
The WWE 2K22 SuperCharger is also available as part of the Season Pass, which comes included in the WWE 2K22 Deluxe Edition and WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Edition.

data.short_description: WWE 2K22 SuperCharger puts the biggest Legends in the WWE universe in your hands. Unlock ALL WWE Legends available at launch, including The Ultimate Warrior & "Stone Cold" Steve Austin. Access arenas so real you’ll be saying “ohhh yeahh” like Macho Man Randy Savage.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550 / AMD FX 8150 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 4 GB Video Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD FX 8350 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 6 GB Video Memory
